scripts.say: Port - Office
I had gone through my morning routine and was right outside the door to my office. It seemed like it was going to be a normal morning.
Opening the door and stepping into the office, I heard all manner of different clinks, clanks, and ticks radiating from somewhere.
Listening closely, I assessed that they were coming from the back.
I scanned the place to get an idea of what might be making the noises, but I couldn't spot anything unusual.
Okay, let's stop and think for a moment. Remember yesterday...
Hey, by the way, I've left a little surprise somewhere in your office~!
Hehehe! Believe me when I say it'll be a bucket of laughs when you find it!
A surprise? What kind of "surprise"?
All of a sudden, something on one of the shelves made a clicking sound.
It came from a stuffed animal that had fallen on its back. That wasn't there yesterday.
Squatting to pick up and inspect the toy, I quickly realized its purpose...
This was no ordinary stuffed animal... it was the trigger for a trap!
Whiiish! Plonk! Splasssh!
A bucket of water that had been left on the topmost shelf was knocked forwards, splashing its contents over my head and shoulders.
Good morning, Commander!
Albacore appeared out of the blue with a towel in one hand and a mop in the other.
I've named this device the "Morning Dew Wake-Up Call"! Based on your reaction, it did its job! Hehehe~!
A lot of thought went into the delivery method and the trigger mechanism to make sure only your head gets drenched! Everything went according to my plan!
That little brat! I should've known!
I swear I'll find one of her weaknesses and get my payback, one way or another!
